B2 completely: I admit it was entirely my fault. The company is run almost entirely by middle-aged men. Synonyms

More examplesFewer examplesCharacters in this film are entirely fictitious.No working environment is entirely stress-free.It was mainly my fault, but she wasn't entirely blameless.A number of illnesses are entirely avoidable.We discovered the solution entirely by accident.
